TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MachineKeyProtection extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies values that indicates whether data should be encrypted or decrypted, whether a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) should be appended or validated, or both.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Security.MachineKeyProtection All = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) should be appended to the data and that the data should be encrypted (for the method) or that the data should be both decrypted and validated (for the method).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Security.MachineKeyProtection Encryption = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the data should be encrypted (for the method) or decrypted (for the method).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Security.MachineKeyProtection Validation = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies that a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) should be appended to the data (for the method) or validated (for the method).
